name: sᴛʀɪɴɢ sᴇssɪᴏɴ ɢᴇɴᴇʀᴀᴛᴏʀ
description: A Telegram Bot to generate Telethon and Pyrogram String Sessions.

MUST_JOIN.description: Username of a group or channel for which you want to set force sub.(without @)

MONGO_URL.description: mongo db url here Get From mongodb.com

API_ID.description: telegram api id here here Get From My.telegram.org

OWNER_ID.description: Telegram id of the person who will known as owner of the bot.

API_HASH.description: telegram api hash here here Get From My.telegram.org
